name: City Fighter vs Street Gang
description:
City Fighter vs Street Gang is a fun and easy to control fighting game where you can show your karate and kung fu skills!
Fight against enemies and bosses, open boxes to discover and equip new weapons, collect oranges, upgrade your character!

Features
- Many unique characters with different fighting combos
- Many different gangsters and bosses to fight
- Quality graphics and smooth gameplay
- Different combo skills
- Easy controls
- Tasty oranges!
developers: GAME THEORY BILISIM YAZILIM VE PAZARLAMA ANONIM SIRKETI
publishers: GAME THEORY BILISIM YAZILIM VE PAZARLAMA ANONIM SIRKETI
